data.comment: The match is underway in Blackburn.
At Ewood Park, Tom Trybull has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Blackburn.
Joe Rothwell is on a sub for Tyrhys Dolan for Blackburn.
In the minute 50, Joe Rankin Costello is booked for the home team.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a second change, with Corry Evans replacing the possibly injured Tom Trybull.
Paddy McNair (Middlesbrough) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 71, Marvin Johnson is replacing Hayden Coulson for the away team.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) has taken off Derrick Williams who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Scott Wharton is the replacement.
Darragh Lenihan (Blackburn) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 79, Middlesbrough make their second substitution with Chuba Akpom replacing Britt Assombalonga.
Scott Wharton for Blackburn has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
That's full-time at Ewood Park. The final score is 0-0.
Lewis Holtby (Blackburn) has received a yellow card from David Webb.
